products.name: Roadrunner-M
products.description: Revolutionary recoverable ground-based air defense interceptor. Twin-jet powered VTOL autonomous air vehicle capable of high subsonic speeds and high-G maneuvers. Features a high-explosive warhead for destroying aerial threats including UAS, cruise missiles, and low-flying aircraft. Uniquely reusable - can return to base, land vertically, refuel, and relaunch in minutes if not deployed against a target.
specifications: Twin turbojet engines with thrust vectoring
Quick refuel and relaunch (minutes, not hours)
Integrated with Lattice AI command and control
Compatible with existing air defense architectures

products.name: DroneBuster
products.description: Combat-proven, handheld Counter-UAS system with more than 2,500 units deployed worldwide. Designed for soldier-level defense, it enables operators to detect, identify, and defeat hostile drones in real time. As the only American-made handheld C-sUAS with optional PNT Attack (GNSS spoofing), DroneBuster delivers unmatched tactical flexibility for U.S. and allied forces.
specifications: Handheld, portable design for individual operators
Detection range up to 7 km across 400 MHz–6 GHz

products.name: Beast+
products.description: Dismount multi-channel receiver that builds upon the battle-proven Beast platform with the addition of a third receive channel and transmit capabilities. Supports detection, direction finding (DF), and electronic attack of adversary signals. This multi-function device performs survey, drive test, and surveillance of multiple push-to-talk and cellular protocols.

products.name: SilentGuardian EW-300
products.description: Advanced vehicular-mounted electronic warfare system designed for wide-spectrum signal detection and neutralization. Features adaptive jamming algorithms and AI-driven threat analysis to counter evolving adversary communications and drone control systems in real-time.
specifications: Range: Up to 5 km effective jamming

products.name: PhantomNet Disruptor
products.description: Man-portable electronic warfare suite combining SIGINT, direction finding, and targeted jamming capabilities. Designed for special operations and rapid deployment scenarios, providing comprehensive electromagnetic spectrum dominance in a lightweight package.

products.name: Wavebreaker Pro
products.description: Compact counter-drone and communications jamming system optimized for fixed-site protection of critical infrastructure. Employs intelligent frequency hopping detection and selective jamming to minimize collateral interference while maximizing threat neutralization.
specifications: Remote operation via secure web interface

products.name: SpectrumHawk X7
products.description: Next-generation airborne electronic warfare pod designed for helicopter and UAV integration. Provides persistent area denial against hostile drones, communications, and radar systems with software-defined radio architecture for rapid mission reconfiguration.

products.name: StormShield Mobile EW Suite
products.description: Ruggedized all-in-one electronic warfare platform built for convoy protection and mobile operations. Combines signals intelligence, electronic attack, and cyber-electronic warfare capabilities in a vehicle-integrated system with autonomous threat response.

additionalComments.easeOfUse: Extremely intuitive interface and autonomous operations make deployment straightforward.
additionalComments.reliability: Flawless performance in field tests. The reusability feature is a game-changer.

additionalComments.interoperability: Integrates seamlessly with existing Lattice AI systems.
additionalComments.transportability: Compact design but requires specialized transport due to jet fuel requirements.
Lightweight and portable - perfect for dismounted operations.
additionalComments.easeOfUse: Minimal training required. Soldiers were effective with it immediately.

additionalComments.detection: Detection range is impressive. AI identification rarely misses.
additionalComments.reliability: Battery life could be extended for longer missions.

additionalComments.easeOfUse: Interface is intuitive but requires practice with PNT spoofing features.
additionalComments.interoperability: Works well with our systems but integration could be smoother.

additionalComments.easeOfUse: Three channels make operations significantly more effective.
additionalComments.interoperability: ATAK integration is seamless and enhances situational awareness.

additionalComments.reliability: Rugged build has held up perfectly in harsh desert conditions.
additionalComments.transportability: Compact for its capabilities but still requires proper carrying case.

additionalComments.easeOfUse: Learning curve is moderate but worth the investment.
additionalComments.detection: Frequency coverage is impressive. EA capabilities are powerful.
